item.title: US climbing star dies in fall from Yosemite's El Capitan

item.description: <p>Telstra has been fined millions of dollars and ordered to pay millions more in compensation for misleading almost 9000 customers on its budget internet provider.</p>

item.title: AEC takes man to court over 'misleading' election pamphlets targeting teal independent
item.description: <p>The Australian Electoral Commission has launched court action against a man it alleges is responsible for nearly 50,000 illegal pamphlets that targeted teal independent Allegra Spender in the lead-up to this year&#x27;s federal election.</p>

item.description: <p>Sarah Mullally, the bishop of London, has been announced as Archbishop of Canterbury, the first time a woman has been chosen as the spiritual leader of the Church of England.</p>

item.title: One of two victims in Manchester synagogue attack may have been killed by a bullet fired by police

item.description: <p>Matthew Haylett has walked out of hospital just six months on from breaking his neck, after he unknowingly struck a sandbank while diving into water at Mullaloo beach.</p>

item.description: <p>A 16-year-old boy is clinging to life after being stabbed several times in a brawl in Perth&#x27;s southern suburbs.</p>

item.title: 'All hell, like no one has ever seen before': Trump's ominous warning as he sets Sunday deadline for Hamas on
item.description: <p>US president wrote on social media that &quot;if this last chance agreement is not reached, all hell, like no one has ever seen before, will break out against Hamas&quot;. </p>
